name: Dice with the Devil
description:
Welcome to Beelzebub's Hotel and Casino - where the only currency we accept is souls. 

Roll the dice to win big against other mortals idiotic enough to enter this realm. Who knows, by defeating them you may even gain a fraction of my power. Unlikely story.

Of course we have new dice available for purchase, only your first three are complementary. Some from my own personal collection are up for grabs - but only to the highest bidder.

And may hell's fury be ever in your favour.

---==--==--==--==---

Special thanks to @CrispulentCrisps for working on the soundtrack for the game!

Logo designed by @nikocatbot

Programming and artwork by @HJBigMuscles

---==--==--==--==---

Please note: This game is in early development and testing, so expect some features to be incomplete or not working as intended. Please report all bugs found in the comments of this post.
